content:
As a result of the next shelling of the village of Tokarivka, the Kherson region was fatal.

About thisinformsKherson Regional State Administration.

As it is noted, the Russian army killed a summer resident of the village of Tokarivka. A 79-year-old man suffered a hostile shelling of wounds incompatible with life.

“The body of the deceased was discovered today by law enforcement. Time and circumstances of death are revealed, ”the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, occupiers 35 timesThey were firedborder of Chernihiv and Sumy region.
title: In the Kherson region as a result of the attack of the Russians, a man was killed
description: The Kherson Regional State Administration informs about it. As it is noted, the Russian army killed an elderly inhabitant ...
author: Army Inform
